links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
formula: a(n) = (number of digits of n when written in base 3)-1.a(n) = if n > 2 then a(floor(n / 3)) + 1 else 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 29 2001
prog: (MAGMA) [ Ilog(3,n) : n in [1..100] ]; (_N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 23 2006)(PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); t=1/log(3); for (n=1, 1000, write("b062153.txt", n, " ", floor(t*log(n) + 0.0000001)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009]
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 06 2001
